name: Anthoni Mathias
description: Anthoni Mathias (SÃ£o Paulo, September 16, 1995), better known by his online nickname Tony , is a streamer, former League of Legends professional player and Brazilian businessman. He last served in the competitive scene as a mid laner of the RED Canids team and has worked at Submarino Stars as a player and content creator. Tony has already competed in the Brazilian League of Legends Championship for the CNB e-Sport Club and, as a reserve, but with significant participation in the playoffs, was part of the RED Canids squad that won thefirststage of the competition in 2017 and played in the Mid-Season Invitational , world championship held in Brazil.

name: Felipe Gonsalves da Rocha
description: Felipe Gonsalves da Rocha, better known as BrTT (Rio de Janeiro, February 19, 1991), is a professional League of Legends player and Brazilian businessman. He serves as a marksman (ADC) and is currently at paiN Gaming. brTT, which is the abbreviation for 'cheap', competes professionally since before the arrival of the Brazilian server and the creation of the Brazilian League of Legends Championship in 2012. During his career, he became six-time national champion, played in the League of World Championship Legends in the 2015 and 2019 seasons is one of the best known League of Legends players in Brazil. In addition to competitive success, he also stands out as one of the main streamers in the country.
